thread.section_title: Real Estate News - Luxury Homes, Property Market and Mortgage Rates - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Foreign Funds Flock to Fledgling U.K. Rental Apartment Market

author: Shefali Anand
title: Foreign Funds Flock to Fledgling U.K. Rental Apartment Market
text:
For decades, as some of the biggest names in U.S. real estate built empires of rental apartment buildings, the business in the U.K. mostly was limited to mom-and-pop landlords with no more than a few dozen units each.
Now, major global institutions are jumping into the game as U.K. living habits change and investors search for higher yields in an aging bull market in commercial real estate. Demand for rentals also is increasing as shortages of affordable housing become more acute in the U.K., matching markets in other parts... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
